data.lyric:
[ti:MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) (Explicit) - Lil Nas X
[00:02.28]Lyrics by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/David Biral/Omer Fedi/Roy Lenzo
[00:04.57]Composed by：Montero Hill/Denzel Baptiste/David Biral/Omer Fedi/Roy Lenzo
[00:06.86]I caught it bad just today
[00:09.45]You hit me with a call to your place
[00:12.14]Ain't been out in a while anyway
[00:14.08]Was hopin' I could catch you throwin' smiles in my face
[00:16.65]Romantic talkin'
[00:17.94]You don't even have to try
[00:20.18]You're cute enough to f**k with me tonight
[00:22.32]Lookin' at the table all I see is w**d and white
[00:25.35]Baby you livin' the life but n***a you ain't livin' right
[00:28.72]C*****e and drinkin' with your friends
[00:31.04]You live in the dark boy I cannot pretend
[00:33.89]I'm not phased only here to sin
[00:36.30]If Eve ain't in your garden you know that you can
[00:39.02]Call me when you want call me when you need
[00:41.78]Call me in the morning I'll be on the way
[00:44.47]Call me when you want call me when you need
[00:47.18]Call me out by your name I'll be on the way like
[00:59.58]Ayy ayy
[01:01.34]I wanna sell what you're buyin'
[01:03.44]I wanna feel on your a*s in Hawaii
[01:06.16]I want that jet lag from f**kin' and flyin'
[01:08.87]Shoot a child in your mouth while I'm ridin'
[01:11.28]Oh oh oh why me
[01:13.74]A sign of the times every time that I speak
[01:16.54]A dime and a nine it was mine every week
[01:19.01]What a time an incline god was shinin' on me
[01:21.65]Now I can't leave
[01:23.54]And now I'm actin' hella elite
[01:26.08]Never want the n***as that's in my league
[01:28.98]I want to f**k the ones I envy I envy
[01:33.04]C*****e and drinkin' with your friends
[01:35.39]You live in the dark boy I cannot pretend
[01:38.31]I'm not phased only here to sin
[01:40.64]If Eve ain't in your garden you know that you can
[01:43.46]Call me when you want call me when you need
[01:46.13]Call me in the morning I'll be on the way
[01:48.80]Call me when you want call me when you need
[01:51.50]Call me out by your name I'll be on the way like
[01:54.03]Oh call me by your name
[01:56.89]Hmm hmm
[01:57.42]You told me you loved me in private
[01:59.06]Hmm ah hmm
[01:59.59]Call me by your name I do not care if you lyin'
[02:05.03]
[02:15.41]Oh
data.trans:
[ti:MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Nas X]
[al:MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.28]//
[00:04.57]//
[00:06.86]今天我感觉糟糕透顶
[00:09.45]你打来电话让我去你家
[00:12.14]反正我已经好久没有出过家门
[00:14.08]我一直希望我能否看见你对着微笑
[00:16.65]说着甜言蜜语
[00:17.94]你甚至不必尝试
[00:20.18]今晚 你迷人可爱 可以与我共度良宵 
[00:22.32]凝视着桌子 我只看见各色好货
[00:25.35]宝贝 你享受人生 但是你放浪形骸
[00:28.72]与你的朋友一起酣快畅饮 沉迷于***
[00:31.04]你活在黑暗之中 男孩 我无法装模作样
[00:33.89]我并非意乱情迷 我只是在感情上犯下罪孽
[00:36.30]如果你的乐园里并没有夏娃的身影 你知道你可以
[00:39.02]你可以随时打给我 只要你有需要 随时打给我
[00:41.78]清晨时分给我打来电话 我随叫随到
[00:44.47]你可以随时打给我 只要你有需要 随时打给我
[00:47.18]以你的名义打电话找我 我马上来找你
[00:59.58]//
[01:01.34]我想卖掉你买下的东西
[01:03.44]我想在夏威夷与你纵享欢乐
[01:06.16]我想要尽情放纵 体会醉生梦死的感觉
[01:08.87]当我驾车驰骋时 与你纵享激情
[01:11.28]为什么是我
[01:13.74]每当我开口说话 就如同时代的标志
[01:16.54]完美无缺 每一周都非我莫属
[01:19.01]多么美好的时光 上帝向我投来赞许的圣光
[01:21.65]现在 我无法离开
[01:23.54]现在 我出类拔萃
[01:26.08]永远没机会跟我团队里的朋友共事
[01:28.98]我想要与我仰慕的人尽情缠绵
[01:33.04]与你的朋友一起酣快畅饮 沉迷于***
[01:35.39]你活在黑暗之中 男孩 我无法装模作样
[01:38.31]我并非意乱情迷 我只是在感情上犯下罪孽
[01:40.64]如果夏娃并未在你的乐园里现身 你知道你可以
[01:43.46]你可以随时打给我 只要你有需要 随时打给我
[01:46.13]清晨时分给我打来电话 我随叫随到
[01:48.80]你可以随时打给我 只要你有需要 随时打给我
[01:51.50]以你的名义打电话找我 我马上来找你
[01:54.03]请以你的名字呼唤我
[01:56.89]//
[01:57.42]你私下向我表达爱意
[01:59.06]//
[01:59.59]请以你的名字呼唤我 我不在乎你是否说谎
[02:05.03]
[02:15.41]//
